pages.text: 23|60|mata omoni kaeru koto o kokoro ni osore, ataerubeki mono o ataeru mono,
23|61|korera no mono wa subete zenji ni isogi, sono sentōnitatsu-shadearu.
23|62|Ware wa darenimo, sono nōryoku ijō no omoni o owa senai. Ware ni wa shinjitsu o kataru shomotsu ga aru node, kare-ra wa kesshite futō ni atsukawa reru koto wa nai nodearu.
23|63|Iya, kare-ra no kokoro wa kore (kuruān no oshie) o mattaku rikai dekinaide iru. Tokorode kare-ra no kōi wa, sore yori hidoi okonaidearu.
23|64|Yagate ware ga, kare-ra no naka no zeitakuna mono o chōbatsu no tame ni toraeru to, miruga ī. Kare-ra wa nakisakebu.
23|65|(Sonotoki ōse rareyou. ) `Imasara aigan shite wameku koto wanai. Anata gata ni wa ware kara no kyūjo wa nai nodearu.
23|66|Ware no shirushi wa, anata gata ni dokuju sa rete itaga, anata gata wa kakato o kaeshite nige,
23|67|kōmandeatta. Kore (kuruān) ni tsuite waruguchi o itte yawa ni fukette ita.'
23|68|Kare-ra wa, kono o kotoba o jukukō shinai no ka. Mukashi no sosen ni okoranakatta mono ga, kare-ra ni okoru to kangaeru no ka.
23|69|Soretomo kare-ra e no shito to mitomezu, kare o kyohi suru no ka.
23|70|Sore de,`kare wa tsuka reta monodearu.' To iu no ka. Sōde wanai. Kare wa shinri o motarashitaga, kare-ra no ōku wa shinri o kirau.

23|71|Moshi shinri ga, kare-ra no yokubari ni fusawashī mononara, tenchi to sonoaida no subete no mono wa,(konran shi) taihai shite shimattadearou. Sōde wanai. Ware wa kare-ra e no kunkai o sazuketaga, kare-ra wa kunkai kara somuki satta nodearu.
23|72|Soretomo anata wa, hōshū o kare-ra ni motomeru no ka. Anata no omo no hōshū koso wa shijōdearu. Kare wa mottomo sugureta kyūyo o ataeru kata de ara reru.
23|73|Hontōni anata wa, tadashī michi ni kare-ra o maneku.
23|74|Daga raise o shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, kanarazu sonomichi kara hagureru.
